quote: A half-truth is even more dangerous than a lie. A lie, you can detect at some stage, but half a truth is sure to mislead you for long.
Lie, it is the American way
The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers, but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions.
The wrong answers are stopping the right ones from emerging.
Right answers to difficult questions are better than wrong answers to difficult questions.
The best way to get the right answer on the Internet is not to ask a question, it's to post the wrong answer.
